content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mr. Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main point of disagreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main point of disagreement was the price. The landlord, Mr. Peter Schmidt, was aiming for a higher price, while I, as a student on a tight budget, was offering a lower price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability as an 8? Please provide specific reasons.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I rated the likeability as an 8 because Mr. Schmidt was respectful and professional throughout the negotiation process. He was clear about his expectations and gave reasons for his price demands, which is understandable and appreciated. However, the rating could have been higher if we had been able to reach an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
